node.name: Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24X50 EBR-4 MOA Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24×50 EBR-4 Rifle Scope allows for executing technical, short and long-range shots. An ideal choice for value-minded shooters who are looking for a riflescope to top their next rig.
node.description:
The Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24X50 EBR-4 MOA Rifle Scope allows for executing technical, short and long-range shots.

With application-specific features and top-notch build-quality, the StrikeEagle Rifle Scope ensures precise, dependable and repeatable performance every time you squeeze the trigger.

The Vortex Strike Eagle Riflescopes are a trim, lightweight and durable package making them the ideal choice for value-minded shooters who are looking for a riflescope to top their next rig.

 

 

Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24x50 EBR-4 Rifle Scope Features

XD™ Lens Elements Extra-low dispersion (XD) glass increases resolution and color fidelity, resulting in crisp, sharp images.
Fully Multi-Coated Proprietary coatings increase light transmission with multiple anti-reflective coatings on all air-to-glass surfaces.
Second Focal Plane Reticle Scale of reticle maintains the same ideally-sized appearance. Listed reticle subtensions used for estimating range, holdover and wind drift correction are accurate at the highest magnification.
Glass-Etched Reticle Allows for intricate reticle design. Protected between two layers of glass for optimum durability and reliability.
Illuminated Reticle Provides precise aiming under low-light conditions

 

Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24x50 EBR-4 Rifle Scope Specifications

Magnification 4-24x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 3.5 inches
Field of View 26.2-4.3 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 12 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 80 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 80 MOA
Parallax Setting 20 yards to infinity
Length 14.9 inches
Weight 25.6 oz

node.name: Vortex Crossfire II 4-12x50 AO BDC Rifle Scope
node.short_description: A 1″ tube diameter, 4x zoom and incredibly versatile top-end magnification makes the Vortex Crossfire II 4-12×50 Rifle Scope the perfect choice.
node.description:
A 1" tube diameter, 4x zoom and incredibly versatile top-end magnification makes the Vortex Crossfire II 4-12x50 Rifle Scope the perfect choice for an endless list of rifle-topping tasks.

Exceptionally clear fully multi-coated optics and a superior build quality offered at a price point that will leave you scratching your head, in a good way! What’s not to like?

Vortex Crossfire II 4-12x50 AO BDC Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 4-12x
Objective Lens Diameter 50mm
Eye Relief 3.9 inches
Field of View 25.7-8.4 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 50 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 50 MOA
Parallax Setting 10 yards to infinity
Length 14.2 inches
Weight 20.6 oz

node.name: Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6x24 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6×24 Rifle Scope provides rock-solid build-quality to ensure accurate, reliable, and repeatable performance – every time you squeeze the trigger.
node.description:
The Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6x24 Rifle Scope provides rock-solid build-quality to ensure accurate, reliable, and repeatable performance - every time you squeeze the trigger.

Executing technical, short, and long-range shots requires a rifle scope with application-specific features and the Strike Eagle Riflescopes boast those features in a trim, lightweight and durable package.

High-quality, fully multi-coated lenses deliver a crisp, clear sight image and optimal low-light performance.

 

Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6x24 Specifications:

Magnification 1-6x
Objective Lens Diameter 24 mm
Eye Relief 3.5 inches
Field of View 116.5-19.2 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/2 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 44 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 140 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 140 MOA
Parallax Setting 100 yards
Length 10.5 inches
Weight 1.1lb / 499gr

node.name: Hawke Airmax 30 SF 6-24x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 6-24×50 AMX IR Rifle Scope has been specially designed for air rifle use, with a rugged and durable build quality to withstand double recoil.
node.description:
The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 6-24x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope has been specially designed for air rifle use, with a rugged and durable build quality to withstand double recoil. Providing exceptionally clear images with side focus control for accurate focus.

Hawke Airmax 30 SF 6-24x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope Features

16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
Stepless rheostat offers total brightness control
¼ MOA exposed, locking and resettable turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring

node.name: Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16X42 BDC Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16×42 Rifle Scope offers a full-on array of high performance features that discerning hunters are sure to appreciate.
node.description:
The Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16x42 Rifle Scope offers a full-on array of features that discerning hunters are sure to appreciate.

The high performance Diamondback HP 4-16x42 hits the proverbial mark. XD extra-low dispersion glass increases resolution and colour fidelity while XR fully multi-coated lenses maximize every minute of shooting light. The side focus/parallax adjustment is easily accessible while keeping a trim profile and allowing optimal mounting height.

 

 

Vortex Diamondback HP 4-16X42 BDC Rifle Scope Specifications

Magnification 4-16x
Objective Lens Diameter 42mm
Eye Relief 4.0 inches
Field of View 23.8-6.1 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 80 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 80 MOA
Parallax Setting 30 yards to infinity
Length 12.5 inches
Weight 18 oz

node.name: Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: Only a high-luminosity rifle scope like the Z8i 2.3-18×56 P from Swarovski Optik can deliver the crucial details even in poor light and at twilight
node.description:
Only a high-luminosity rifle scope like the Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18x56 P can deliver the crucial details even in poor light conditions. This rifle scope has superb optics that deliver razor-sharp images even in challenging situations.

The high magnification and detail accuracy also deliver impressive precision over long distances.

 

Swarovski Optik Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-I Technical Data:

Magnification 2.3-18
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 18.4-56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.1
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 55.8-6.9 / 18.6-2.3
Field of view (degrees) 10.6-1.3
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 6.5-31.8
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8/36.0 / 1.8/1.0
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75

node.short_description: The Hawke Airmax 30 SF Compact 6-24×50 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and offers side focus down to 10 yards.
node.description:
The Hawke Airmax 30 SF Compact 6-24x50 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and offers side focus down to 10 yards.

Hawke Airmax 30 SF Compact 6-24x50 AMX IR Features:

Wide Angle optical system ideal for varmint/airgun
Lightweight and compact construction – short eye relief
16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
6 levels of brightness with off positions in-between
1⁄10 MRAD capped, resettable target turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring

node.name: Vortex PST II 5-25x50 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Viper PST Gen II Rifle Scope hands an unfair advantage to shooters who seek to keep the upper hand in every situation from close quarters to long-range shots.
node.description:
The Vortex Viper PST Gen II Rifle Scope hands an unfair advantage to shooters who seek to keep the upper hand in every situation, from close quarters to long-range shots.

The illumination dial is cleanly integrated into the side focus adjustment knob for easy access and streamlined performance.

The glass-etched reticle offers shooters highly functional, intuitive and detailed hold points yet remain uncluttered for optimal viewing, features 10 intensity levels with off positions between each setting.

 

Vortex PST II 5-25x50 Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 5-25x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 3.4 inches
Field of View 24.1-4.8 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 25 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 70 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 35 MOA
Parallax Setting 25 yards to infinity
Length 16 inches
Weight 884.5gr

node.name: Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope is a long-range wolf in sheep’s clothing, the Diamondback scopes are some of the best scopes that money can buy.
node.description:
The Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope is a long-range wolf in sheep's clothing, the Diamondback scopes are some of the best scopes that money can buy.

Rather than cramming features in at the expense of turret performance and optical quality, the Diamondback Tactical dials it back, putting the focus where it counts. Exposed turrets bring tracking performance previously unheard of at this price point, while its optical system delivers sharp image quality even at extended range. Its relatively simple design places you firmly in the driver's seat with the potential to take on that 1,000yd mark and beyond, all at a price that's easy to justify for new shooters, your training rifle, as well as experienced shooters looking for a back-to-basics optic on their fun gun.

Opt for one of the first focal plane models on a sweet-shooting rifle and you've got yourself a perfectly capable competition rig without breaking the bank.

 

 

Vortex Diamondback Tactical 6-24X50 FFP MOA Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 6-24x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 3.9 inches
Field of View 18-4.5 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tall Exposed Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 65 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 65 MOA
Parallax Setting 10 yards to infinity
Length 14.5 inches
Weight 24.6 oz

node.name: Swarovski Z8i 0.75-6x20 LD-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z8I 0.75-6X20 LD-I Rifle Scope from Swarovski Optik is designed for driven hunts, the Z8i 0.75-6×20 L with 8x zoom means you never miss any of the action.
node.description:
The Swarovski Z8I 0.75-6x20 LD-I Rifle Scope is designed for driven hunts, with 8x zoom you will never miss any of the action.

Thanks to VIEWPLUS 0.75x magnification this rifle scope offers 30% more field of view. The D-I reticle has been reduced to a single point of focus to enable an unobscured view of the target.

The CLICKONE function has a tangible click so that you know when you have reached 1x magnification. You can also customise the light to suit your particular hunting needs with our range of top-quality accessories.

 

 

Swarovski Optik Z8I 0.75-6X20 LD-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 0.75-6x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 6.3-20
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.2
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 168.0-21.0 / 56.0-7.0
Field of view (degrees) 31.0-4.0
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 2.1-11.0
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 72 / 2
Objective filter thread M 27x0.75
